short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web.TV screen sharing for web conference

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enable screen sharing functionality for Web.TV video conference. Participants can share their screen and application windows with another participants in the same web.tv conference channel.
